nodes.text: Formerly known as Royal Flower, and sometimes referred to as Josephine's Pride, Jericho's Pride was a personalized Mindabaal Custom pleasure yacht owned by the smugglers Jericho Donovan and Josephine Donovan.

It was originally owned by James Ortell Donovan but stolen by his criminal daughter upon her graduation from the Mindabaal Royal Academy boarding school, and used by her in her career as a privateer. She modified it for the purpose. Later, upon being kidnapped by her own sister, Josephine Donovan became a regular crewmember on the ship, as the sisters pursued a smuggling career to thwart the cause of the Galactic Empire.
The sisters also used the alias Josephine's Honor when referring to the ship.
